Title: Sisters
Writer: Brian De Palma (screenplay), Louisa Rose (screenplay), Brian De Palma (original story)
Actors: Margot Kidder, Jennifer Salt, Charles Durning, William Finley
Plot: A fledgling Staten Island journalist witnesses a brutal murder in the neighboring apartment of a French-Canadian model, but the police do not believe that the crime took place. With the help of a private detective, she seeks out the truth.
